statements: SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Provider_Performance_Metrics;
SELECT Provider_Name, Performance_Score FROM Healthcare_Provider_Performance_Metrics ORDER BY Performance_Score DESC;
SELECT Provider_Name, Patient_Satisfaction_Score FROM Healthcare_Provider_Performance_Metrics WHERE Patient_Satisfaction_Score > 80;
SELECT Provider_Name, Quality_of_Care_Score FROM Healthcare_Provider_Performance_Metrics ORDER BY Quality_of_Care_Score ASC;
SELECT Provider_ID, Provider_Name, Performance_Score FROM Healthcare_Provider_Performance_Metrics WHERE Performance_Score >= 90;
SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Provider_Performance_Metrics ORDER BY Performance_Score DESC, Quality_of_Care_Score ASC, Patient_Satisfaction_Score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT Provider_Name, Patient_Satisfaction_Score AS SatisfactionScore, Quality_of_Care_Score AS CareScore FROM Healthcare_Provider_Performance_Metrics WHERE Performance_Score > 80;
SELECT Provider_Name, Performance_Score, Patient_Satisfaction_Score FROM Healthcare_Provider_Performance_Metrics WHERE Quality_of_Care_Score < 80 ORDER BY Provider_Name ASC;
SELECT Provider_Name, Quality_of_Care_Score, Performance_Score FROM Healthcare_Provider_Performance_Metrics WHERE Patient_Satisfaction_Score > 60 ORDER BY Provider_Name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(Provider_ID) AS Total_Providers, AVG(Performance_Score) AS Average_Performance FROM Healthcare_Provider_Performance_Metrics WHERE Quality_of_Care_Score > 70;
SELECT * FROM providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT provider_name, location FROM providers ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE efficiency_rating > 4.5;
SELECT provider_name, service_type, patient_satisfaction_rating FROM performance_metrics WHERE provider_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE efficiency_rating > 4.5 AND patient_satisfaction_rating > 3.5;
SELECT provider_name, location FROM providers WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT provider_id, AVG(efficiency_rating) AS avg_efficiency_rating FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY provider_id HAVING AVG(efficiency_rating) > 4.0;
SELECT * FROM providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT location, provider_name FROM providers WHERE location LIKE '%York%';
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM providers WHERE provider_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 80 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment FROM patient_records WHERE provider_id = 3;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location FROM providers WHERE specialty = 'Dentist';
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%Cancer%';
SELECT provider_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, specialty, location FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patient_records ORDER BY diagnosis DESC;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM patient_records WHERE provider_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, location FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM quality_metrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location FROM healthcare_providers JOIN patient_records ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = patient_records.provider_id WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Providers ORDER BY provider_id DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM Providers WHERE location='New York';
SELECT provider_id, specialty, average_rating FROM Providers WHERE average_rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT provider_name, COUNT(*) as total_appointments FROM Providers p JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name HAVING total_appointments > 10;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location FROM Providers WHERE average_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY provider_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, gender FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY patient_age DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, provider_name, specialty FROM Appointments JOIN Providers ON Appointments.provider_id = Providers.provider_id ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT rating_value, feedback FROM Ratings WHERE rating_value BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY rating_value DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT provider_name, location, average_wait_time FROM Providers JOIN PerformanceMetrics ON Providers.provider_id = PerformanceMetrics.provider_id ORDER BY average_wait_time ASC LIMIT 5
